COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118
STRING: I looked all over school yesterday, but I didn't see any
sign of Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: That meant she had been absent from school for three
days in a row.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144
STRING: But still, I had no choice but to roam around the school,
believing that Lise would appear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee
STRING: Between classes I went to Homeroom 1B to ask if Lise
had shown up, and during classes I looked elsewhere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: After several rounds of this, I found myself standing in
front of the Old Wing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: I'd stepped outside because it was lunchtime and Torta
might have been on campus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230
STRING: At this point, I had no idea what to say to her if saw
her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: I'm sure I looked desperate right now, and Torta would
instantly suspect that something was wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: But I had come to this place almost unconsciously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: I tried the front door, but just as Ms. Cordell had said
some time back, it was locked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: I stood there doing nothing until the end of lunch, then I
went back to the main building.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2
STRING: Come to think of it, today was the day for Grave's
lecture.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be
STRING: We had both been eliminated at the second lecture, so
there wasn't supposed to be anyone in lecture room B
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x304
STRING: When I walked past lecture room B, I heard the faint
sounds of a Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: Perhaps Grave was composing something, alone, just as
Ms. Cordell told me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330
STRING: For a moment I thought that this had nothing to do with
Lise, but then I realized that the opposite was far likelier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350
STRING: Why wasn't she able to sing?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: What was making her think that way?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368
STRING: And why hadn't it occurred to me before that Grave
was involved somehow...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e
STRING: I quietly opened the door, which was at the back of the
lecture room, and peeked inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x394
STRING: I was acting suspiciously, but the hallways were empty
because everyone was having classes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aa
STRING: And the third years, who didn't have class, were almost
all in the practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x404
STRING: [Grave] “What, I said you could play that song of yours
that you like so much. Shouldn't you look a little
happier?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x478
STRING: The sound of Lise's Fortelle reverberated throughout the
narrow lecture room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x484
STRING: It seemed powerful enough to throw the doors open
and stop me from entering.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49a
STRING: If I had to describe the emotion in that sound in one
word, it would be “sadness.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b0
STRING: Ms. Cordell and Phorni had called it a love song, but all I
could hear in it was a tragic melody.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d2
STRING: There was also something tragic about her playing the
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e8
STRING: The cane attached to Lise's chin was pressing against
her throat and causing her a lot of pain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fe
STRING: Even so, it didn't look like she would stop playing the
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514
STRING: That must've been one of Grave's methods, as Lise
didn't show any sign of resistance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: As I watched them, the song went on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536
STRING: When I realized that, I opened the door forcefully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: I walked slowly toward them in an attempt to control
my emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a8
STRING: No one scolded me for my act of disrespect, however.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d8
STRING: [Chris] “...What are you doing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: [Grave] “A private lesson. I had set aside this time for a
lecture, but I didn't have any students to teach, so I
decided to make good use of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x620
STRING: [Chris] “...And what is that cane for? It has no relevance
to the lesson, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x640
STRING: After some moments, Grave seemed to relax his grip on
the cane that pressed against her throat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x656
STRING: No, that wasn't it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: He suddenly flexed his arm, causing Lise to cry out and
almost bend over backward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x698
STRING: [Lise] “Aah!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: [Grave] “Good music comes from good posture. This is
necessary for straightening the spine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Chris] “You're mad!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ec
STRING: That was so loud, even I was surprised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: [Lise] “＊gulp＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Grave] “What do you know? Be quiet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x734
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise, let's go. You can't be here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x752
STRING: [Grave] “The only one leaving here is you, Chris Vertin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x780
STRING: Grave finally removed the cane from Lise's throat and
turned to face me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: [Grave] “Why did you come here? You are no longer
qualified to attend this lecture.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d2
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: [Lise] “I-I'm sorry. I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x826
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay, we can talk later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x858
STRING: [Grave] “Liselsia.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: [Lise] “...Y-Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a8
STRING: [Grave] “I have something to say to this insolent boy.
Leave us, and return in half an hour.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e4
STRING: [Lise] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fa
STRING: [Chris] “Lise!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92c
STRING: [Lise] “I... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x942
STRING: Lise headed for the exit, her eyes resolutely downcast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98c
STRING: [Grave] “Chris Vertin. Consider this an honor. I so rarely
take the time to speak to anyone these days.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e8
STRING: When I ignored him and tried to chase after Lise, he
spoke again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: [Grave] “Liselsia can't sing anymore. Give up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa32
STRING: It was a throwaway line, he was mocking me, but
somehow it also carried a firm note of conviction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa48
STRING: It was obvious that he knew our relationship had
reached the point of partnership.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5e
STRING: In that case, how could he be so certain?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6a
STRING: And it bothered me that he'd said “can't” sing, not
“won't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa80
STRING: [Chris] “...What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: There was nothing polite about my tone of voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: I could go after Lise anytime.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: And unlike the last encounter... She would probably
return here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac4
STRING: I was sickened by Grave's words and his attitude, but
for now it was better to talk to him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb02
STRING: [Grave] “The meaning is clear. Wayward children need
to be disciplined with a slightly heavier hand, but it
seems to have worked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb22
STRING: [Chris] “...Discipline?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: [Grave] “Good grief... It beggars belief that the heir to
the Cesarini name would perform an ensemble with one
such as you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb60
STRING: [Chris] “...What kind of discipline?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: [Grave] “And, in spite of her gift of magic, her electing
to sing instead of playing the Fortelle placed her future
in jeopardy, so there was no other choice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbbc
STRING: [Chris] “...Mr. Cesarini, do you mind answering the
question?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf8
STRING: [Grave] “One doesn't need a throat to play the Fortelle,
surely? Oh, it wasn't anything extreme. Just a little
pressure was applied, and it was enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc22
STRING: Grave brought both hands up to the level of his eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: He made a small circle with his fingers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3a
STRING: As if he were holding something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc46
STRING: ...Something as thick as a human neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: [Grave] “It was foolish of Liselsia to have pursued this
enterprise, when she should have given it up the first
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8e
STRING: [Chris] “...What are you talking about? First time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcac
STRING: [Grave] “Strictly speaking, a Fortelle player has no need
for feet, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: All she has to do is sit in a chair.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf0
STRING: As if he'd made a brilliant joke, Grave could barely stifle
his laughter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd06
STRING: Slowly, the meaning of what he'd said sank in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd12
STRING: I had some recollection of those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1e
STRING: But I still couldn't believe it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2a
STRING: Was that really something a parent could do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd36
STRING: [Chris] “...She's your daughter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd68
STRING: [Grave] “On paper, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9c
STRING: [Grave] “She was picked up, from the orphanage. To be
groomed to become my successor, that was her
purpose. What cause do I have for hesitation?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc6
STRING: [Chris] “...What you've done is a crime.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde4
STRING: [Grave] “So? What will you do? No one's going to listen
to you, or else I wouldn't be telling you all this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe04
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe22
STRING: [Grave] “You understand now, of course? Liselsia and
you are completely different. It would be best not to get
involved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: [Chris] “...That is not for you to say. I'll decide for
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6a
STRING: [Grave] “I don't remember saying for whom it would be
best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe8a
STRING: [Chris] “...You intend to do something else to Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea8
STRING: [Grave] “If the need arises.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: It seemed I had misunderstood him all this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeca
STRING: A great musician who looked stern, but who also held
music in the highest regard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee0
STRING: But who was he, really?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeec
STRING: What stood before me was nothing but a mad
nobleman.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef8
STRING: Vilely domineering, insensitive, and utterly pompous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: Whether it was our country's systems or our culture
which produced such people, I didn't know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf24
STRING: But I had lost all interest in this person before me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf56
STRING: [Grave] “So? Do you finally understand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: This time, I totally ignored him and walked out of the
lecture room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfbc
STRING: I heard something behind me that sounded like a
scolding, but I didn't care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff4
STRING: Lise... Where was she now?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1000
STRING: The place she always went to when escaping from
Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: But it was locked, there was no way to get inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: Which meant she was probably waiting in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1024
STRING: I never doubted that she would be there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: Every muddy step I took across the rain-soaked ground
was bringing me closer to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: There was still no sign of Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: But she was here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise. Liselsia.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: Lise was leaning against the door of the Old Wing,
shivering from the cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1138
STRING: [Chris] “Let's go back. To my room.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116a
STRING: [Lise] “Go back? ...Yes, I must go back...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1180
STRING: [Chris] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119e
STRING: [Lise] “Father will...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b4
STRING: [Chris] “Lise!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Lise] “I'm sorry! I'm sorry... I won't sing again... I won't
defy you again...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1206
STRING: Lise wasn't looking at my face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1212
STRING: Shaking her head in fear, she kept apologizing over and
over again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1228
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Listen to me. You don't have to go back
to Grave, ever again. Let's go to my place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: [Lise] “...I'm sorry, I won't sing again, ever...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127a
STRING: Still looking down, Lise kept on going, sounding almost
delirious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129c
STRING: To make her look at me, I touched her shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Lise] “No!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e4
STRING: [Chris] “Lise!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fa
STRING: I was no longer afraid of her reaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1306
STRING: Bravely, I held on to her shoulder and made her look at
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1312
STRING: Then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131e
STRING: Our eyes met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1346
STRING: [Lise] “Ch... Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135c
STRING: [Chris] “Listen carefully.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: [Chris] “...You will not go back to Grave. Sing whatever,
however you want.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a8
STRING: [Chris] “I won't let anyone hurt you again... Will you
come with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e4
STRING: [Lise] “But... But!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fa
STRING: Lise backed away as if she was afraid of me, but there
was nowhere to go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: There was a solid door just behind her, she couldn't run
from me or anyone else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1426
STRING: In a panic, she had pressed her hands against her neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143c
STRING: I walked up to Lise, gently held her arms and got her to
release her grip on her neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1474
STRING: As if clinging on to Lise's white skin, that bandage
asserted its presence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: It was hiding her injuries, I was sure of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149e
STRING: [Lise] “Stop... Don't look...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: [Chris] “...I won't stop. Show me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d2
STRING: [Lise] “...No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e8
STRING: Betraying her words, Lise's arms were already hanging
limp by her side, and she made no attempt to stop me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1516
STRING: Unwinding the bandage revealed two reddish-black
bruises in the shape of hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152c
STRING: [Chris] “＊gulp＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: I cringed at the sight, and felt a great pang of guilt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: If only I hadn't asked her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: If only I hadn't thought of making Lise my partner, none
of this would have happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157a
STRING: ...No, that wasn't true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1586
STRING: She had trembled when she said those words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1592
STRING: “I won't sing again, ever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159e
STRING: Those were probably words she had learned to say all
the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b4
STRING: Or perhaps they were a reflex, for when that old man
taught her his so-called “discipline.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: With or without my involvement, Lise's fate would
probably have been the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: That was how unhinged Grave was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ec
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1602
STRING: With the gentlest of gestures, I touched her neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1618
STRING: For just one moment, Lise shuddered in fear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1624
STRING: [Chris] “...It's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1650
STRING: [Chris] “...It's going to be okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1666
STRING: Lightly, I traced the outline of her bruises, then I held
the back of her neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1694
STRING: Then I embraced Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a0
STRING: Lise didn't put up any resistance at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Liselsia.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d4
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Er... C-Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ea
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry. I won't let anyone hurt you again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: [Lise] “But... I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171e
STRING: [Chris] “You've got me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174a
STRING: I couldn't think of anything else to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1756
STRING: Instead, I held her even more tightly in my arms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1762
STRING: So that she would believe what I said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176e
STRING: So that she understood my feelings for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1782
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1798
STRING: That time, Lise said my name clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a4
STRING: And her arms, which had been hanging by her side,
went around my waist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... I love you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d8
STRING: [Lise] “I... Me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1818
STRING: We held each other in the rain for a while, exchanging
numerous kisses.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: The rain kept falling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1830
STRING: As if to wash away both her tears and my sins.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1876
STRING: After that, I went back to my room with Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1882
STRING: Lise was currently asleep in my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188e
STRING: I had put up her rain-soaked uniform on a hanger to dry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a4
STRING: Dressed only in one of my shirts, Lise was in a safe
place now, asleep, where nothing could hurt her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d6
STRING: [Phorni] “...Something happened?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ec
STRING: [Chris] “...You could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: Phorni had been silent all this time, waiting until Lise fell
asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1918
STRING: I was grateful, but somehow I couldn't find the words to
express it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192e
STRING: I thought about Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193a
STRING: About Lise's injuries.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: Trying to put all that into words made my heart wrench.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196e
STRING: [Phorni] “The bandage was partly undone... There were
bruises...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1984
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x199a
STRING: Phorni was starting to understand the situation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19b0
STRING: How Lise had behaved until now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19bc
STRING: The injuries around her neck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c8
STRING: There was no way to cover them up, nor was there any
desire to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d4
STRING: [Chris] “I'll start from the beginning, about everything
that happened today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f8
STRING: I moved Phorni down from her usual spot by the
window to the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0e
STRING: I sank into my chair and looked Phorni straight in the
eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a24
STRING: [Chris] “I have to start by talking about Grave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a58
STRING: I told Phorni everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a64
STRING: As she listened, Phorni's expression turned to one of
deep sorrow, and she gradually ran out of responses.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a7a
STRING: But I had a duty to keep talking, and she had a right to
listen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab0
STRING: [Chris] “And that's why I brought Lise back here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aea
STRING: [Phorni] “...Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b00
STRING: [Chris] “Honestly... I haven't decided what to do from
now on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b1e
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b34
STRING: [Chris] “Things might get a little troublesome from now
on... And I might not be able to tell you everything that
happens... But I hope that's okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7a
STRING: [Phorni] “If I said it wasn't, would you change your
mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b90
STRING: [Chris] “Well, that's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc2
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm kidding. I just wanted to put you on the
spot. Of course it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be2
STRING: [Chris] “...Now's not the time for...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c14
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, it's your fault for not trusting me, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5c
STRING: [Phorni] “You just have to tell me what the current
situation is, that's all. We've been together a long time,
so I understand.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c86
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni... Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca4
STRING: [Phorni] “No need to thank me. Oh, and when Lise's
awake, I'll try not to appear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: [Chris] “No... All I meant was that I wouldn't be able to
answer you out loud...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: [Phorni] “I don't want to get in the way of your youthful
passions.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d16
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d48
STRING: [Phorni] “Am I wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5e
STRING: [Chris] “...No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d90
STRING: [Phorni] “Well then, don't hold back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da6
STRING: [Chris] “You shouldn't show such unnecessary concern
either, you know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd8
STRING: [Phorni] “If it were really unnecessary, I wouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dee
STRING: [Chris] “Then don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e20
STRING: [Phorni] “No way. Even if you're fine with it, Lise
wouldn't be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e36
STRING: [Chris] “...And why would Lise worry about you, Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e68
STRING: [Phorni] “Because she'd worry about you worrying
about me. You may say one thing, Chris, but I'm sure
you won't be able to ignore me, so this is for the
best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e92
STRING: [Chris] “Look, I said...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec4
STRING: [Phorni] “I've decided, so your opinion will be ignored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef2
STRING: See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f14
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2a
STRING: I held my breath in case that shout woke up Lise, who
was sleeping right behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f40
STRING: But Lise was still fast asleep, and breathing serenely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f56
STRING: I breathed a sigh of relief.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f62
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni, whenever you feel like appearing, just
do so, it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f82
STRING: I said that in a whisper, and told myself that Phorni
probably heard me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd0
STRING: Lise was still sleeping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fdc
STRING: I had set up the Fortelle right next to her, and I was
playing Lise's song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff2
STRING: The song was filled with my love for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2016
STRING: [Lise] “In a corner of the classroom... It's just like...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202e
STRING: [Chris] “...Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2060
STRING: [Lise] “...Ah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2076
STRING: I turned my eyes away instantly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: Lise had one of my shirts around her shoulders, and the
rest of her body was wrapped up in a towel blanket.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2098
STRING: [Chris] “By the front door... Your uniform...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b6
STRING: [Lise] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20cc
STRING: I did as I said right away, and closed my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f4
STRING: Behind me, I heard Lise get out of bed and patter away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210a
STRING: Then came the sound of the uniform coming off the
hanger and being put on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2120
STRING: I held my breath, and after a while she called out to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213e
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... It's okay now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2154
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a0
STRING: [Lise] “Erm... Thank you, for what you did today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b6
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d4
STRING: [Lise] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ea
STRING: [Chris] “Whatever happens, you can't go back there,
Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x221c
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: [Chris] “You don't have to say it so formally. I... I
probably can't stay in that school anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226e
STRING: [Lise] “...That's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2284
STRING: [Chris] “Like I said, don't worry about it. As for you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22b6
STRING: [Lise] “Me!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e4
STRING: ...I don't mind at all. But you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f0
STRING: [Chris] “Call me by my name. As I said, I probably won't
be your senior anymore... Besides, I like hearing you say
my name.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2336
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234c
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Anyway, I'm totally fine with the
situation. As long as you're with me, Lise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2374
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238a
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23bc
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d2
STRING: Lise called out my name, then she started to cry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23de
STRING: At least, they weren't tears of sadness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: I gave her a hug, then sat down in front of the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2400
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Now you can sing whatever you want to,
whenever you want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2428
STRING: [Lise] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x243e
STRING: [Chris] “Let's have an ensemble?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2470
STRING: [Lise] “...Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24dc
STRING: It had taken a very long time for us to make this
ensemble possible again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f2
STRING: But I was able to play the Fortelle for her, and Lise still
remembered the song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2508
STRING: Our sounds blended as if we were real partners who'd
been performing together for years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x251e
STRING: Somewhere within those waves of sound, I declared my
love for Lise, and she declared her love too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2534
STRING: Instead of words, we made music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2540
STRING: Over and over again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254c
STRING: As long as time allowed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2558
STRING: We spent many blissful hours that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2590
STRING: [Chris] “Well then, good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25ca
STRING: [Lise] “I... Is it really okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e0
STRING: [Chris] “It's fine. I can't have you sleep on the floor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2612
STRING: [Lise] “In that case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2628
STRING: [Chris] “I'm fine with it. Come on, you should sleep early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x265a
STRING: [Lise] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2670
STRING: Lise sounded a little disappointed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x267c
STRING: I didn't know what her intention was, but she seemed
convinced for now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2692
STRING: [Chris] “Good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26b0
STRING: [Lise] “Good night... Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26dc
STRING: Tired out from singing, Lise fell asleep right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e8
STRING: When I was sure she was asleep, I went to check that
the door was locked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26fe
STRING: There was no guarantee that Grave would sit around
and do nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270a
STRING: The door's lock and chain were the only two things
protecting us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2720
STRING: They seemed a little unreliable, but we had no other
choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x273c
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2752
STRING: Back in the room, I lay down on the towel that I'd put
on the floor, and looked at the ceiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2794
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27aa
STRING: Out of nowhere, Phorni appeared on the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27b6
STRING: [Chris] “...What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e8
STRING: [Phorni] “Do you want to hear what I thought of Lise's
singing, after hearing it for the first time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27fe
STRING: [Chris] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2830
STRING: [Phorni] “I thought she seemed really familiar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2846
STRING: Torta had said the same thing, some time ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2852
STRING: Well, to be more accurate, she had tried to say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x285e
STRING: [Chris] “...I think so too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2890
STRING: [Phorni] “No, it's not what you think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28d8
STRING: [Phorni] “She reminds me of you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28fa
STRING: That was all Phorni said before she disappeared.
